about_the_game:
Street Karate 3 immerses players into an adrenaline-pumping beat 'em up experience where they assume the role of a fearless and adept fighter. Confronted with daunting odds, players engage in intense duels against waves of formidable adversaries.

Game Features
  • Dynamic Beat 'em Up Action: Engage in exhilarating battles against multiple opponents, showcasing your martial prowess and adapting strategies to overcome challenging odds.
  • Immersive Weapon Utilization: Harness a variety of improvised weapons like rebars and knives strategically placed throughout levels, transforming everyday objects into potent tools of combat.
  • Ultimatum Strike System: Unleash a game-changing ultimatum strike to disperse adversaries in dire situations, but exercise caution as its use comes with tactical trade-offs.
  • Strategic Resource Management: Carefully manage healing techniques to maintain your fighter's endurance, ensuring survival through intense encounters and enabling progress.
  • Diverse Combat Techniques: Execute throws, jump kicks, and grabs to craft a personalized fighting style, enhancing your abilities and forming essential tactics for victory.
detailed_description:
Street Karate 3 immerses players into an adrenaline-pumping beat 'em up experience where they assume the role of a fearless and adept fighter. Confronted with daunting odds, players engage in intense duels against waves of formidable adversaries.

Game Features
  • Dynamic Beat 'em Up Action: Engage in exhilarating battles against multiple opponents, showcasing your martial prowess and adapting strategies to overcome challenging odds.
  • Immersive Weapon Utilization: Harness a variety of improvised weapons like rebars and knives strategically placed throughout levels, transforming everyday objects into potent tools of combat.
  • Ultimatum Strike System: Unleash a game-changing ultimatum strike to disperse adversaries in dire situations, but exercise caution as its use comes with tactical trade-offs.
  • Strategic Resource Management: Carefully manage healing techniques to maintain your fighter's endurance, ensuring survival through intense encounters and enabling progress.
  • Diverse Combat Techniques: Execute throws, jump kicks, and grabs to craft a personalized fighting style, enhancing your abilities and forming essential tactics for victory.
name: Street karate 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1030
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Street Karate 3 is a thrilling beat 'em up game where you combat numerous foes in unequal duels. Wield improvised weapons, execute powerful strikes wisely, and utilize throws and jumps to conquer challenges. Revive strategically, prove your skill, and emerge victorious!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Hungarian*, Vietnamese*, Greek*, Danish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*, Azerbaijani*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Afrikaans*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bangla*, Bosnian*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Dari*, Zulu*, Hebrew*, Igbo*, Indonesian*, Irish*, Icelandic*, Yoruba*, Kazakh*, Kannada*, Catalan*, Quechua*, Kinyarwanda*, K'iche'*, Konkani*, Xhosa*, Khmer*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Persian*, Serbian*, Sotho*, Sinhala*, Sindhi*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Uzbek*, Uyghur*, Urdu*, Filipino*, Hausa*, Hindi*, Croatian*, Cherokee*, Scots*, Estonian*
